creator: rovf@operamail.com
text:
When you go to http://ant.apache.org/manual/index.html  and then chose

  Developing 
with Ant
  Tasks Designed for Extension

and then click on one of the links on this page, 
such as "Task", you get the error message

"The requested URL 
/manual/api/org/apache/tools/ant/Task.html was not found on this 
server."

(Browser: Opera 6 running under Windows 2000)

fixed the manual to say "The links will not work in the online version of this
document."
creator: bodewig@apache.org
